Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.modelSupport

Class Shelf

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.modelSupport.Shelf
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Shelf extends Object implements Serializable
A class representing a shelf that can hold BoardCard objects.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

    Shelf()
    Constructs a new Shelf object with a 2D array of BoardCard objects.

  • Constructor Details

    • Shelf

      public Shelf()
      Constructs a new Shelf object with a 2D array of BoardCard objects. Initially all EMPTY_SPOT card types

  • Method Details

    • getEmptyColumn

      public int getEmptyColumn()
      Returns the maximum number of empty spots in any column.
      Returns:
      an integer value representing the maximum number of empty spots in any column

    • insertInColumn

      public void insertInColumn(ArrayList<BoardCard> selCards, Integer colIndex) throws ColumnNotSelectable, ShelfFullException
      Adds a list of BoardCard objects to a column in the shelf.
      Parameters:
      selCards - the list of cards to add to the column
      colIndex - the index of the column to add the cards to
      Throws:
      ColumnNotSelectable - if the column index is invalid, the list of cards is too long, or the column is already full
      ShelfFullException - if the shelf is already full

    • shelfIsFull

      public boolean shelfIsFull()
      Checks whether the shelf is full.
      Returns:
      true if the shelf is full, false otherwise

    • columnIsFull

      public boolean columnIsFull(int colIndex)
      Checks whether a given column in the shelf is full.
      Parameters:
      colIndex - the index of the column to check
      Returns:
      true if the column is full, false otherwise

    • getShelfCards

      public BoardCard[][] getShelfCards()
      Returns the current state of the shelf as a 2D array of BoardCard objects.
      Returns:
      a 2D array of BoardCard objects representing the current state of the shelf

    • getCardAtPosition

      public BoardCard getCardAtPosition(int row, int column)
      Returns the BoardCard object at the specified position in the shelf.
      Parameters:
      row - the row index of the position
      column - the column index of the position
      Returns:
      the BoardCard object at the specified position

      Computes the score performed via groups of similarly colored cards
      Returns:
      int, adjacent points
